data.eml:eml: Revision of the Palaearctic and Oriental species of the genus Oides Weber, 1801 (Coleoptera: Chrysomelidae: Galerucinae)

This dataset contains the digitized treatments in Plazi based on the original journal volume Lee, Chi-Feng, Beenen, Ron (2017): Revision of the Palaearctic and Oriental species of the genus Oides Weber, 1801 (Coleoptera: Chrysomelidae: Galerucinae). Zootaxa 4346 (1), DOI: https://doi.org/10.11646/zootaxa.4346.1.1
